name: Catching
description: Attempt to live or drop catch every ball that comes to the flippers.

name: Nudging
description: Nudge off of everything to see the best way to get reliable feeds.

name: Dribbling
description: Post pass, tap pass, or shatz before each shot. Use microflips to get under control.

name: Accuracy
description: Make a specific shot 5 times in a row, then move to the next shot.
